content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: While hypothetically portraying Peter Schmidt, I'm keen on securing the highest possible price for this well-situated, modern apartment. Nonetheless, I hope this exchange sheds some light on how a landlord in my given persona might approach the situation.
